General.Name: Cosigo Resources Ltd.
General.Description: Cosigo Resources Ltd. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Colombia and Brazil. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Machado project, which covering an area of 4,800 hectares located in the Vaupes Province, Colombia, as well as Damian project located in the province of Cauca, Colombia. The company was formerly known as Cosigo Resources Inc. and changed its name to Cosigo Resources Ltd. in April 2011. Cosigo Resources Ltd. is headquartered in Victoria, Canada.
General.Address: PO Box 31029, Victoria, BC, Canada, V8N 6J3
